alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Jackson Hole; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 7:43PM MST until January 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 foot possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains, Jackson Hole, Wind River Mountains West, Star Valley and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Jackson Hole; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Wind River Mountains West
